\section*{\begin{picture}(20,0) \put(-5,-10){\includegraphics*[width=1cm]{/www/erowid.org/experiences/images/erologo_1cm_600dpi_greyscale}} \end{picture} Erowid Experience Vaults Report Id: 76023}

\subsection*{Looking For a New Substance}
\vspace{-0.2cm}
by \emph{Exaddict}
\vspace{0.5cm}
\thispagestyle{plain}

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|c|c|c|}
\hline
Dose:  T+ 0:00 & 400 mg & oral & Pharms - Pregabalin & \\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{1mm}

\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|}
\hline
Body weight: & 0.00 lbs\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{2mm}
I found a bottle of 30 lyrica capsules. i took them and felt relaxed. I was on Xanax, Klonopin, and Restoril awhile back, and was a big pharmaceutical abuser. I knew Lyrica was Schedule 5 for some reason. I took about 5-10 of the 50mg capsules and felt the sedation and euphoria from benzos and barbituates.



be safe because this is a new drug. i am going to ask my doctor for a script.
